Body:
c = ccl.halos.ConcentrationDuffy08(M200)
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    p = prof_class(None)
if prof_class == ccl.halos.HaloProfileNFW:
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        p = prof_class(c, projected_analytic=True, truncated=True)
p = prof_class(c)
smoke_assert_prof_real(p)
pytest.mark.parametrize('prof_class', [ccl.halos.HaloProfileNFW, ccl.halos.
    HaloProfileHernquist, ccl.halos.HaloProfileEinasto])
